Arising from the four abodes of existence, the afflictions of the three realms of suffering are constructed.
They are immeasurable and boundless.
They disturb the sages and the six destinies and four forms of birth.
Today, we confess and repent before the buddhas, the supreme Dharma, and the noble assembly in the ten directions.
We vow that by relying on this repentance,
The merits produced by repenting of the afflictions of greed, anger, and delusion that arise from the mental activities,
We will, in life after life, break the banner of arrogance, exhaust the water of desire,
Extinguish the fire of anger, and dispel the darkness of ignorance.
We will uproot the basis of doubt and tear apart the net of views.
We will deeply understand the three realms to be like a prison,
The four elements to be like poisonous snakes,
The five skandhas to be like bandits,
The six sense bases to be like an empty village, and craving to be like a false friend.
We will cultivate the eightfold noble path to cut off the source of ignorance.
We will head straight for nirvana without stopping.
The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment continue in the mind-stream.
The ten perfections are always present.
